SEARCH
Package Engine.Collisions

Class CollisionHandler

java.lang.Object
Engine.Collisions.CollisionHandler
public class CollisionHandler extends Object
The CollisionHandler class handles collision detection and resolution between entities and tiles. It provides methods to check for collisions between entities and tiles, as well as retrieving entities within a specified bounding box.
